thanks for all support.

and this is deltas source[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 01, 2008, 12:22:29 pm[/size][hr]BUMP

alright this is in client.java btw

im showing all lines with the bones id “526”

} catch(Exception e) {} ItemHandler.addItem(526, absX, absY, 1, KillerId, false); try { } catch(Exception e) {} if (itemKept1 > 0) addItem(itemKept1, 1); if (itemKept2 > 0) addItem(itemKept2, 1); if (itemKept3 > 0) addItem(itemKept3, 1); if (keep6570) { addItem(6570, 1); keep6570 = false; }

} else if ((NPCID == 526) || (NPCID == 527)) { // Shop Keeper + Assistant PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 3; // Falador General Store } else if (NPCID == 1039) {
